title: INFLUX (Impromptu Games) (GOG) (ENG)
description:
Information:
Release Date: 23 July 2013
Genre: Action / Tpp / Puzzle
Developer: Impromptu Games
Publisher: Impromptu Games / GOG
Language: English
Voice set Language: English
Publication Type: License
Tablet: Not required

System Requirements: 
Operating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8
CPU: 2 GHz
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 256 MB
Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
Hard disk: 2 GB

Description:
INFLUX is A Puzzle That game mixes Exploration and Puzzle platforming in A series of beautiful and abstract Natural Environments. You are a mysterious metal sphere which falls from the sky, traversing an apparently deserted island dotted with cubic structures of glass and steel. Each glasshouse is a puzzle to be solved.
